content.raw:
The official gazebo website give link to this script for the latest gazebo 11.  
Everyone that want to download gazebo 11 end up with download this scrip that download gazebo 9.

If you want people will download and use gazebo 11, please fix this script.  
Latest version: 11.0.0 \(30 Jan 2020\) => [http://get.gazebosim.org/](http://get.gazebosim.org/) => this script for gazebo 9.
content.html:
The official gazebo website give link to this script for the latest gazebo 11.
Everyone that want to download gazebo 11 end up with download this scrip that download gazebo 9.

If you want people will download and use gazebo 11, please fix this script.
Latest version: 11.0.0 (30 Jan 2020) => http://get.gazebosim.org/ => this script for gazebo 9.
